message:module::not_loaded: That module doesn't exists. Try !help to see a list of available modules
message:not_admin: You need admin rights in order to do that
message:module::not_enabled: That module is loaded, but is disabled. Ask the admin about it

message:module::load_error: That module is loaded, but there are some troubles (at reload, json-php not readable/lint). If you are the admin, see the logs!
